internal.database

Interface TupleGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TupleGeneratorImpl

    public interface TupleGenerator
    This interface can be used for generating tuples to populate a database.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRelSchema(String name, String[] attribute, String[] domain, String[] primaryKey, String[][] foreignKey)
      Add the relational schema for a given table.
      void addRelSchema(String name, String attribute, String domain, String primaryKey, String[][] foreignKey)
      Add the relational schema for a given table.
      Comparable[][][] generate(int[] nTuples)
      Generate tuples for all of the tables.

    • Method Detail

      • addRelSchema

        void addRelSchema(String name,
                String[] attribute,
                String[] domain,
                String[] primaryKey,
                String[][] foreignKey)
        Add the relational schema for a given table. Do this for all tables and then generate the tuples.
        Parameters:
        name - the table's name
        attribute - the array holding the table's attributes
        domain - the array holding the table's domains
        primaryKey - the array of primary keys, format is {"id", "ssn"}
        foreignKey - the array of foreign keys, format is {{ "attrName", "referenceTable", "referenceAttr"}, ... } e.g., {{ "studId", "Student", "id" }, { "crsCode", "Course", "crsCode" }}

      • addRelSchema

        void addRelSchema(String name,
                String attribute,
                String domain,
                String primaryKey,
                String[][] foreignKey)
        Add the relational schema for a given table. Do this for all tables and then generate the tuples. This is convenience method.
        Parameters:
        name - the table's name
        attribute - the string embedding the table's attributes
        domain - the string embedding the table's domains
        primaryKey - the string embedding the table's primary keys
        foreignKey - the array of foreign keys

      • generate

        Comparable[][][] generate(int[] nTuples)
        Generate tuples for all of the tables.
        Parameters:
        nTuples - the int array that contains the number of tuple for each table
        Returns:
        Comparable [i][j][k] 3D array, where 'i' is the table number, 'j' is the tuple number and 'k' is the attribute number
